summary: A new follower for all to enjoy
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center][center][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][size=6][font=Georgia][color=#ff00ff][b]Casey Whitemane[/b][/color][/font]
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4211/35843868465_5b42dbc611_h.jpg[/img]
[/size][/color][/font]

[color=#d5a6bd][size=4]Casey is Kodlak Whitemane's granddaughter who was apposed of the Companions requirements and decided that she should not have to be influenced to become anything more than herself.
She decided to leave Whiterun and travel to find her own path.
Adventuring through Skyrim brought her to the small village of Ivarstead where she heard the call of the Greybeards for the Dragonborn and decided to wait for the chance to travel and adventure with such a great hero.
[size=5]She awaits the Dragonborn inside The Vilemyr Inn.[/size]




[color=#a64d79][size=5]Nord Race[/size][/color]
[color=#a64d79][size=5]Combat Archer Class[/size][/color]
[color=#a64d79][size=5]Essential and Marriageable
Archery and Swordsman Perks
Levels 6 to 150
Female Sultry Voice
Elven Bow and Skyforged Dagger and Sword
Simple Hide Armor and Nicely Enchanted Jewelry
[/size]
[color=#00ffff][size=5][color=#8e7cc3]Installation:
Nexus Mod Manager
or
Manual- Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data[/color]
[/size][/color]
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4213/35712009101_0810dfdfee_h.jpg[/img]

[/color][size=5]Compatible Skeleton Required for TBBP and UUNP

Please feel free to post constructive comments and screenshots[/size]
[size=5]Please post screenshots to let me see how she looks in everyone's game[/size]

[/size][/color][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/24998734][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4205/35034174753_6216d8089e_h.jpg[/img]
[/url][/size]
[font=Verdana][color=#c27ba0][size=3][color=#b4a7d6][size=6][u]Credits[/u][/size][/color][color=#ead1dc][size=4]
Zoe's Body TBBP by zackey
CBBE by Caliente
SeveNBase TBBP by Wast1980
Dreamgirl TBBP by Petrovich
UUNP Bodyslide[/size][/color][/size][/color][/font][font=Verdana]
[color=#c27ba0][size=3][color=#ead1dc][size=4][color=#c27ba0][size=3][color=#ead1dc][size=4]Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy
[/size][/color][/size][/color]Brows by [/size][/color][/size][/color][color=#ead1dc][size=4]Hvergelmir[/size][/color][color=#ead1dc][size=4]
Eyes of Beauty by LogRamm
Creating Standalone Followers by Natilde
Bethesda for Skyrim

[color=#ff00ff]
As with my other followers Casey should be compatible with Skyrim Special Edition[/color][/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff][size=6]Added another new follower so check her out[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=6]![/size][/color]
[/font][/center]
author: lewbob
